data.actual_result: Image loads up. When exiting, Discord crashes.
data.expected_result: Search layer slides up without disturbance.
data.short_description: Tapping an image quickly after tapping search and exiting the viewer causes the app to crash
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap 'Search' (Magnifying Glass Icon) - Quickly tap an image while the search layer is sliding up (This may take a couple of attempts if you have a faster phone) - Exit out of the image and Discord will crash.
